Player History
Drafted in 8th round, 218th overall pick, by Cleveland in 2008...
Earned first career win on 4/15/2014...
Traded from Cleveland to Detroit on 4/23/2014 (Going to CLE: SS R. Pierson, 1B T. Harrison. Going to DET: P S. Hernandez)...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Detroit in 2017...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/1/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
Injured on 9/30/2022 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/18/2023 to a 2-year deal worth $5,760,000 per year...
Released by Houston on 4/15/2024...
Drafted in 10th round, 295th overall pick, by Los Angeles (A) in 2025...
